Lunarpine awoke seated next to the stasis pod. he was week, but still 
functioning. "Computer report." There was no answer. his power levels 
were so low that his internal computer had shut itself off. He was in 
bad shape.

A whineing sound came from the pod, DNA scan complete, no compatable 
lifeforms. Protoform not systemized for replication.

"Of course it's not, it's splattered all over the ground." Lunarpine 
was tired of hearing the pods scanner so he raised his hand and 
slapped the control.

Malfunction

BOOM

The control panel exploded sending him about 30 feet through the air, 
crashing through the tall grass to the hard ground below. Lunarpines 
sensors flashed dark and he passed out.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> OOC:( the sabertooth tiger attacked the pod and knocked it over.  
> That would have caused more damage to the pod. Just keep that in 
mind)
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Lunarpine found his way back to the stasis pod. he fumbled around 
> > returning the circuitry he'd removed until he got a slight power 
> > reading. The wolfbot hooked himself up hopeing that the pod had 
> > enough energy to sustain him. He hoped that the pod would emit a 
> > strong enough reading to attract Maximals. He hoped that they'd 
> pick 
> > up the signal before the Preds.
